definition: straight/erect/to stick out (a part of the body)/to (physically) straighten up/to support/to withstand/outstanding/(coll.) quite/very/classifier for machine guns
stick/pole/lever/classifier for long objects such as guns

sentences.english: The cam follower rides against a push rod, which pushes against a rocker arm.
sentences.chinese: 凸轮挺杆推动控制摇臂的推杆。

sentences.english: Insert flat-base tappets in their original position.
sentences.chinese: 将平底挺杆插入其原始位置中。

sentences.english: Fit bucket and switchable tappets at their original position.
sentences.chinese: 将筒式挺杆和可调换挺杆安装至其原始位置。

sentences.english: Fit bucket and switchable tappets at their original position.
sentences.chinese: 将筒式挺杆和可调换挺杆安装至其原始位置。
拆下筒式挺杆和切换挺杆。
拆下筒式挺杆和切换挺杆。

sentences.english: Do not interchange the flat-base tappets.
sentences.chinese: 不要将几个平底挺杆互换。

sentences.english: Make sure that the flat-based tappet guides are not damaged.
sentences.chinese: 确保不损坏平底挺杆导轨。

definition: valve (esp. tire valve)/accelerator (obsolete term for 油門|油门)/stigma (zool.)/spiracle
cylinder (of steam engine or internal combustion engine)
